name: Spectre: Virtual Reality Horror
blurb: "Haunt your friends or be haunted in Spectre, an ambitious new first-person horror/thriller game"

rewards.reward: SPECTRE SUPPORTER =============================\r\nThanks for supporting Spectre! Your name will be featured in Spectre's in-game credits and on the official game website!
SPECTRE FAN ============================= Thanks for supporting Spectre! Your name will be featured in Spectre's in-game credits and on the official game website!
SPECTRE COMPLETE GAME DIGITAL DOWNLOAD\r\n(Early Bird) ============================= \r\nBe rewarded for your early support. You'll receive a digital download of the release ready game!

SPECTRE COMPLETE GAME DIGITAL DOWNLOAD
============================= 

You'll receive a digital download of the release ready game!

EARLY ACCESS MULTIPLAYER
=============================
Experience Spectre before everyone else! You'll get access to Spectre's beta multiplayer and have the opportunity to provide feedback to the developers. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will also receive a digital download of the release ready game.

HALL OF HORRORS\r\n============================= Experience the original art of Spectre in VR in the Hall of Horrors. Available from the game main menu, you will be able to enter Hall of Horrors which features the original art and models of SPECTRE produced with maximum integrity. Spectres, art, and trapped souls await in this VR interpretation of the game art book. \r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will receive a digital download of the release ready game and access to the multiplayer beta.

PHANTASMIC PHOTOGRAPH
============================= 
Become immortalized in the world of Spectre in the form of a mansion portrait! Send us a fitting photo of alone or with company, in any pose, costume, or situation, and we will display it proudly in a large picture frame within the mansion. Venture in game to discover your photo displayed for all to see.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will receive a digital download of the release ready game and access to the multiplayer beta.

TRAPPED SOUL
============================= 
You will be immortalized, trapped inside a crystal orb repeating your last words over and over with the rest of the trapped souls. Since you will be in the game, your soul will of course receive credits among the no longer living. You will also receive a 3D wallpaper of your trapped soul. Venture in game to see your trapped soul in VR.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will receive a digital download of the release ready game and access to the multiplayer beta.

PERSONALIZED PHASING PORTRAIT
============================= 
Painted by artists, Amanda Hopkins and Eleanor Bartlett, we will create an intricate custom portrait of your face to gaze upon players within the game. Your portrait's eyes will follow players as they walk past. Try not to stare; if players glance away, your portrait will become demented, appearing terrifyingly warped and disfigured. In addition to having your hand-painted, dynamically changing portrait displayed within Spectre, you will receive the physical paintings themselves, signed by the artists.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will receive a digital download of the release ready game and access to the multiplayer beta.

FAIR BARONESS PORTRAIT
=============================
Observe the Spectre herself as she appeared in life. This beautiful hand-painted work of art will be displayed within the mansion. You will receive this one of a kind portrait, (23.4 x 16.5 in) signed by the artist! You will also receive a personalized letter from the team thanking you for your contribution! 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will receive four digital downloads of the release ready game and four player access to the multiplayer beta.

SINISTER SPECTRE PORTRAIT
=============================
Gaze upon the ghastly form of the Spectre herself, as she bears down with malice from the confines of her framed prison. This one of a kind collectible is hand-painted and signed by the artist. You will receive this portrait, as well as a personalized letter from the team thanking you for your contribution!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will receive four digital downloads of the release ready game and four player access to the multiplayer beta.
